snippet: In Justin Bieber’s new album, “Believe,” he branches out musically while hewing to the persona he created.
abstract: Justin Bieber's new album Believe is an attempt to branch out musically while carefully avoiding alienating his fan base; Bieber, who turned 18 in March, is striving to mature under the scrutiny of the public eye.
lead_paragraph: In Justin Bieber’s new album, “Believe,” he branches out musically while hewing to the persona he created.

headline.seo: Justin Bieber’s Album ‘Believe’ Comes Out Tuesday
headline.main: Pop’s Good Boy Tries Growing Up
headline.print_headline: Pop’s Good Boy Tries Growing Up
